objects.name: KarenText
objects.string:
I don't have to wear a mask
its my constitutional right!!!

objects.name: Intro
objects.string:
Oh no, the coronas want to harm you
Shoot them away with your isolation gun.
Each hit is worth 1 point, being hit takes away 1 life.
Don't shoot the green ones or you will lose 5 points.
If you can grab them, they will grant you 10 lives...



HOW TO PLAY:
USE 'W', 'A', 'S' and 'D' ON KEYBOARD TO MOVE
MOUSE CLICK TO SHOOT FACE MASKS


A score of 100 points moves you to the next level...
Karen will be waiting for you after Level 2

Press 's' to start.

objects.name: NewObject
objects.string:
LEVEL 2!










Press the '2' key to start
